caption.p: Survival rate of woody species with different mycorrhizal types in the E. urophylla plantations. NM, non-mycorrhizal; AM, arbuscular mycorrhizal; EM, ectomycorrhizal; NF, nitrogen-fixing. Values are the means ± SE. Bars with different letters are significantly different based on Tukey’s HSD tests ( P < 0.05).
